p: To better understand the observed results, an additional assay was performed to evaluate which natural products present in the organic and aqueous extracts could be responsible for the exhibited anti-tyrosinase activity. Thus, previously isolated compounds from both organic and aqueous extracts of Plectranthus spp. were tested for their ability to inhibit tyrosinase inÂ vitro, and the results obtained are shown in Figure 4(C).
